statements: SELECT * FROM adventure_experiences
SELECT user_id, experience_name FROM adventure_experiences WHERE user_rating > 4.5
SELECT experience_name, user_review FROM adventure_experiences ORDER BY user_rating DESC
SELECT user_id, user_rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE experience_id = 3
SELECT experience_name, user_review, user_rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM adventure_experiences WHERE user_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY experience_name DESC;
SELECT experience_name, user_review, user_rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY user_rating DESC;
SELECT experience_name, user_rating FROM adventure_experiences ORDER BY user_rating ASC, experience_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM adventure_experiences WHERE user_rating BETWEEN 4.0 AND 4.5 ORDER BY user_rating DESC, experience_id ASC;
SELECT experience_id, user_id, user_rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE user_rating < 3.0 OR user_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM adventure_experiences;
SELECT experience_name, location FROM adventure_experiences ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT experience_name, location, rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT user_id, count(experience_id) as total_experiences FROM user_reviews GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM user_reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM adventure_experiences WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY experience_name ASC
SELECT experience_name, location, rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE location = 'mountain' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT experience_name, location, rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 AND location LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY location ASC

SELECT ae.experience_name, ae.rating, ur.review_text FROM adventure_experiences ae INNER JOIN user_reviews ur ON ae.experience_id = ur.experience_id WHERE ae.rating > ur.rating ORDER BY ae.rating DESC

SELECT ue.user_id, ae.experience_name, ur.review_text FROM user_reviews ur INNER JOIN adventure_experiences ae ON ur.experience_id = ae.experience_id INNER JOIN adventure_experiences ae2 ON ur.experience_id = ae2.experience_id INNER JOIN user_reviews ue ON ae2.user_id = ue.user_id ORDER BY ue.user_id ASC
SELECT experience_name, location, rating FROM adventure_experiences;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT experience_name, location, rating FROM adventure_experiences WHERE location = 'Mountains';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM adventure_experiences;
SELECT experience_name, location, rating FROM adventure_experiences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, r.review_text FROM users u JOIN user_reviews r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT * FROM adventure_experiences WHERE location = 'Mountain' AND rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM AdventureTravelExperiences;
SELECT experience_name, location, category FROM AdventureTravelExperiences;
SELECT experience_name, location, category FROM AdventureTravelExperiences WHERE category = 'Hiking';
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM Users;
SELECT rating, review_text, review_date FROM Reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM AdventureTravelExperiences;
SELECT experience_name, location, category FROM AdventureTravelExperiences WHERE category = 'Hiking' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT Users.username, Reviews.rating, Reviews.review_text FROM Users INNER JOIN Reviews ON Users.user_id = Reviews.user_id WHERE Reviews.rating > 4;

SELECT adventure.experience_name, users.username, reviews.rating FROM AdventureTravelExperiences adventure INNER JOIN Users users ON adventure.experience_id = users.user_id INNER JOIN Reviews reviews ON reviews.experience_id = adventure.experience_id WHERE reviews.rating < 3;

SELECT recommendation_id, Users.username AS recommended_by, AdventureTravelExperiences.experience_name AS recommended_experience FROM Recommendations INNER JOIN Users ON Recommendations.user_id = Users.user_id INNER JOIN AdventureTravelExperiences ON Recommendations.recommended_experience_id = AdventureTravelExperiences.experience_id;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT review_id, rating, comments FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT experience_name, location, price FROM adventure_experiences WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT user_id, recommended_experience_id, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC, rating ASC
SELECT user_name, email, location FROM users WHERE location='New York'
SELECT experience_name, location, price FROM adventure_experiences WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM user_reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_reviews > 2
SELECT u.user_name, e.experience_name, r.average_rating FROM users u JOIN user_reviews r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN adventure_experiences e ON r.experience_id = e.experience_id
